line.text:
Planned Work
[1] Van Cortlandt Park-bound trains skip 50, 59, 66, 79 and 86 Sts

Late Nights, 11:45 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Nov 10 - 14

For service to these stations, take the [1] to 72 St or 96 St and
transfer to a downtown [1] or [2] local.

For service from these stations, take the [1] or [2] to 72 St or
Times Sq-42 St and transfer to a Van Cortlandt Park-bound [1].




Planned Work
[1] South Ferry-bound trains skip Christopher, Houston, Canal and Franklin Sts

Late Nights, 11:45 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Nov 10 - 14

For service to these stations, take the [1] to Chambers St and transfer to an uptown [1] or [2] local.

For service from these stations, take the [1] or [2] to 14 St and transfer to a South Ferry-bound [1].

Planned Work
[6] Brooklyn Bridge-bound trains skip Longwood Av, E 149 St, E 143 St, Cypress Av and Brook Av

Late Nights, 11:45 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, until Nov 21

For service to these stations, take the [6] to 3 Av-138 St and transfer to a Pelham Bay Park-bound [6].

For service from these stations, take the [6] to Hunts Point Av and transfer to a Brooklyn Bridge-bound [6].




Planned Work
[4] No trains between Brooklyn Bridge and Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr

[2] [N] [Q] trains provide alternate service
Late Nights, 11:45 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Nov 10 - 14

[4] Service operates in two sections:
1. Between Woodlawn and Brooklyn Bridge, making local stops
2. Between Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr and New Lots Av,
running express between Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr and Franklin Av

Travel Alternatives[TP]

For service between Manhattan and Brooklyn, take the [D] or [Q].

For Lower Manhattan and Downtown Brooklyn, take the [2] or [N].

Key Transfer Stations

Brooklyn Bridge/Chambers St[4] and [J]

*This detour has taken into account additional planned service changes.

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

line.name: ACE
line.text:
Planned Work
[A] Ozone Park/Far Rockaway-bound trains run express from Hoyt-Schermerhorn to Utica Av

Late Nights, 11:45 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, until Nov 21

For service to Lafayette, Clinton-Washington, Franklin and Kingston-Throop Avs,
take the [A] to Utica Av and transfer to an Inwood-bound [A].

For service from these stations, take the [A] to Hoyt-Schermerhorn and transfer
to an Ozone Park/Far Rockaway-bound [A].

Alternate travel note:
Transfer between trains with Unlimited Ride MetroCard at Nostrand Av.

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

line.name: BDFM
line.text:
Planned Work
[FT]
[F] No trains at B'way-Lafayette St, 2 Av, Delancey St, East Broadway and York St
[SB] Free shuttle buses and [D] [J] trains provide alternate service

Late Nights, 10 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Nov 10 - 14

[F] Trains run via the [A] in both directions between W 4 St and Jay St-MetroTech.

[SB] Free shuttle buses operate along two routes:
1. Between B'way-Lafayette St and East Broadway, stopping at 2 Av and Delancey St
2. Between York St and Jay St-MetroTech

Travel Alternatives[TP]FASTRACK map | pdf
 
Affected StationAlternate Station/Service
B'way-Lafayette St [D] via transfer at W 4 St or 4 Av-9 St*
Delancey St[J] via transfer at Fulton St
2 Av, East Broadway[SB] via B'way-Lafayette St [D] or Delancey St [J]
York St[F] at nearby High St [A] station
[SB] via Jay St-MetroTech

*This detour has taken into account additional planned service changes.

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.  

Click here for the 2014 FASTRACK schedule.




Planned Work
[D] Norwood-bound trains skip 155, 161, 167, 170, 174-175 and 182-183 Sts

Late Nights, 10:45 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Nov 10 - 14

For service to these stations, take the [D] to Tremont Av or Fordham Rd and transfer
to a Coney Island-bound [D].

For service from these stations, take the [D] to Tremont Av or 145 St and transfer
to a Norwood-bound [D].

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

line.name: G
line.text:
Planned Work
[G] No trains between Metropolitan Av and Bedford-Nostrand Avs

[SB] Free shuttle buses provide alternate service
Late Nights, 10:30 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Nov 10 - 14

[G] service operates in two sections:
1. Between Court Sq and Metropolitan Av, every 20 minutes
2. Between Bedford-Nostrand Avs and Church Av, every 15 minutes

[SB] Free shuttle buses make all stops between Metropolitan Av and Bedford-Nostrand Avs,
stopping at Broadway, Flushing Av and Myrtle-Willoughby Avs.

• Transfer between trains and buses at Metropolitan Av or Bedford-Nostrand Avs.

Show Shuttle Bus Stops
StationShuttle Bus Stop
Metropolitan Av [G] [L]Union Av at Metropolitan Av
BroadwayUnion Av at Broadway
Flushing AvLee Av at Flushing Av (to Bedford-Nostrand Avs)
Marcy Av at Flushing Av (to Metropolitan Av)
Myrtle-Willoughby AvsNostrand Av at Myrtle Av (to Bedford-Nostrand Avs)
Marcy Av at Myrtle Av (to Metropolitan Av)
Bedford-Nostrand Avs [G]Lafayette Av at Bedford Av

line.name: NQR
line.text:
Delays  Posted: 11/12/2014 12:07AM

Following an earlier incident at New Utrecht Av, [N] train service has resumed with residual delays.

Planned Work
[R] No shuttle train between 59 St and 36 St

Late Nights, 11:45 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Nov 10 - 14

[R] service operates between 95 St and 59 St.

• Take the [N] instead. Transfer between trains at 59 St.

line.name: B1 - B84
line.text:
Planned Detour
B44 and B44 SBS - Southbound bus stop on Nostrand Av at Gates Av temporarily relocated

Beginning Mon, Nov 4 until further notice

Due to construction, please follow directional signage to the nearby temporary stop on Nostrand Av at Monroe St.




Planned Detour
B32, B62 and Q59 - Northbound/Eastbound bus stop on Broadway at Roebling St
temporarily relocated

Until further notice

Due to construction, please use the nearby stop on Broadway at Driggs Av for
northbound B32, B62 and eastbound Q59 service.

line.name: M1 - M116
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 11/12/2014 12:04AM

M9 and M14A buses are detoured in both directions, due to paving on Houston St and Essex St.

Detour is as follows:

M9 Northbound: Via Essex St, left on Rivington St, right on Allen St, right on Houston St and regular route.

M9 Southbound: Via Houston St, left on Allen St, left on Delancey St, right on Essex St and regular route.

M14A Eastbound: Via 14 St, right on 2 Av,left on Houston St, right on Allen St, left on Delancey St, right on Essex St and regular route.

M14A Westbound: Via Essex St, left on Delancey St, right on Allen St, left on 14 St and regular route.

All corresponding stops will be made.

Allow additional travel time.



Delays  Posted: 11/12/2014 12:04AM

M42 buses are running with delays westbound, due to heavy traffic on 42 St from Broadway to 9 Av.

Allow additional travel time.



Planned Detour
M86 - Temporary bus stop change on W 86 St at Broadway

Until further notice

Due to construction:

Eastbound: The first stop is on W 87 St at West End Av.

Westbound: The last stop is on W 86 St between Broadway and Amsterdam Av.




Planned Detour
M4 - Bus stop on Fort Washington Av between 178 St and 179 St temporarily closed

Until late Spring 2015

Due to construction, please use the nearby stop on Fort Washington Av at 177 St in both directions.




Planned Detour
M2/M2 LTD and M3 - Southbound bus stop on Broadway at 168 St temporarily relocated

Until further notice

Due to construction, please follow directional signage to temporary stops on 168 St at Audubon Av
(M2) and on Broadway at 168 St (M3).

line.name: Q1 - Q113
line.text:
Planned Detour
Q69 - Southbound bus stop on 28 St between Queens Plaza South and 42 Rd
temporarily relocated

Until further notice

Due to construction, please use the temporary stop on 42 Rd between Jackson Av and 28 St.




Planned Detour
Q37 buses rerouted from the Casino Bus Stop Area

5:30 AM to 1:30 AM, every day, until late December

Due to construction, buses run via Casino Rd making corresponding stops.

Show Reroute Details
Via Rockaway Blvd
Enter Casino and continue straight on Casino Rd
Passing regular bus stop area then regular route

Leaving bus stop use left side of double road through lot
toward exit of casino then regular route





Planned Detour
Q111 and Q114 - Southbound temporary bus stop closure on 147 Av at Springfield Ln

Until further notice

Due to construction, please use the nearby stop on 147 Av at 225 St.




Planned Detour
Q111 and Q114 LTD - Northbound bus stop on 222 St at 147 Av temporarily closed

Until further notice

Due to construction, please use the nearby stop on 225 St at 147 Av.




Planned Detour
B32, B62 and Q59 - Northbound/Eastbound bus stop on Broadway at Roebling St
temporarily relocated

Until further notice

Due to construction, please use the nearby stop on Broadway at Driggs Av for
northbound B32, B62 and eastbound Q59 service.

line.name: x1 - x68
line.text:
Planned Detour
X17A/C and X19 - Southbound bus stop on Broadway between Cedar St and Thames St
temporarily relocated - Revised

Until Saturday, Nov 15

Due to construction, please follow directional signage to nearby temporary stops on Broadway
at Exchange Pl and Morris St.

Note: Additional changes are expected in mid-November as construction progresses.

Reminder: X17A and X19 buses do not operate on weekends.




Planned Detour
X12 - Southbound bus stop on Liberty St at Cortlandt St temporarily relocated

Until Friday, Dec 19

Due to construction, please follow directional signage to the nearby temporary stop
on Broadway at Thames St.




Planned Detour
X10 - Southbound bus stop on Broadway between Rector St and Pine St
temporarily relocated - Revised

Until Saturday, Nov 15

Due to construction, please follow directional signage to the nearby temporary stop on Broadway at Exchange Pl and Vesey St.

Note: Additional changes are expected in mid-November as construction progresses.




Planned Detour
X1 - Southbound bus stop on Broadway between Rector St and Pine St
temporarily relocated

Until Saturday, Dec 20

Due to construction, please follow directional signage to the nearby temporary stop
on Broadway at Cedar St.

line.name: Montauk
line.text:
Delays  Posted: 11/11/2014 11:40PM

Eastbound

The 8:53PM train from Jamaica due Montauk at 11:57PM is operating 19 minutes late at this time.

 

Westbound

The 10:38PM train from Montauk due Jamaica at 1:47AM is operating 23 minutes late due to a late-arriving E/B train in single track territory.
